title: Game keeps starting in Windowed mode
body:
Ever since I downloaded LCU last night, whenever I go in a game it always starts in Windowed mode. I had it set to borderless mode before and it's worked for years and if I set it to borderless again it just changes back to windowed the next game. How do I fix this?

This issue also seems to be exclusive to the updated client. I have no problems starting on borderless on the legacy client.

replies.body:
It sounds like your settings aren't saving, which can happen if your config has become corrupt.  Try performing a config reset to fix this up.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

I hope that helps!
Thanks! Had the same problem and this fixed it!
